title: Eternity
description: ENDLESS PASSIONAfter years of loneliness, Veronica found the love of her life--and sensual delights beyond imagining. A man of unholy secrets and hidden desires, David de Morrissey freed himself from his cursed past to find new happiness with Veronica.But, deep in her heart, she still craves the thrilling danger and erotic power of the man David once was. And now her worst fears, and most private fantasies, seem to be coming true... As the dark, timeless hunger tries to reclaim David, will Veronica find sweet love in the sunlight--or forbidden pleasures in the night?
author: Lori Herter
